1.title: Man vs. Nature
1.plot: A diver fights off a great white shark; a lumberjack chainsaws a forest; a man with a knife and a toaster finds out how powerful electricity can be.

2.title: How to Be a Man
2.plot: How to throw a punch; how to throw a knife; how to avoid a grizzly bear attack; how to operate heavy equipment with the skills of a surgeon.

3.title: Ultimate Man Skills
3.plot: How to be an expert skeet shooter; how to drive an off-road racer; how to avoid turning a Thanksgiving turkey into an exploding ball of fire.

4.title: Safe and Sound
4.plot: A burning car careens out of control; a couple nearly gets fried by a bolt of lightening; a scrappy girl demonstrates a wicked choke-hold.

5.title: Take Charge
5.plot: A drunk gets punched after teasing a mascot; a $20,000 sports car plows through raging floodwaters; tenacious moles tear up manicured lawns.

6.title: Conquer the Great Outdoors
6.plot: A car careens on a dangerous, icy road; a shepherd uses a drone to herd sheep; a lost hiker must figure out how to signal for rescue and save his life.

7.title: Do It Yourself
7.plot: Family members use a simple hair care product to fix bashed-in bumpers; an expert angler dives deep underwater and catches lobsters with her bare hands; vicious raccoons invade a restaurant, threaten customers and make off with their doughnuts.

8.title: Life Skills
8.plot: How to save one's life with a homemade tourniquet; how to jump start a car; how to save one's life with a coconut when stranded on a deserted island with no water to drink.

9.title: Step Outside
9.plot: A massive swarm of 10,000 bees threatens a family; a powerful rip current drags a helpless diver hundreds of feet into the ocean's murky depths; a skier falls through ice and her body temperature drops 40 degrees below normal.

10.title: Roll Up Your Sleeves
10.plot: Cleaning out a recreational vehicle's septic tank; a giant catapult hurls deadly projectiles at enemies hundreds of yards away; a woman yanks an enormous catfish out of the deepest recesses of a river cave.

11.title: Get Your Hands Dirty
11.plot: Unsuspecting roofers pull the tiles off an old roof, and thousands of bats pour out; a super-powerful pressure washer destroys the interior of a car; fragile heirlooms fall out of the back of a moving truck and crash onto the street.

12.title: Don't Screw Up
12.plot: An emergency landing in a forest full of trees shears off a plane's wings and tail; a nail gun drives a nail deep into a construction worker's wrist; a grill chef gets careless with his lighter fluid and causes a massive explosion.

imdb.plot outline: Win Lose or Fail curates the most entertaining and informative "How To" videos on the web, so viewers don't have to. This program is VO-driven and has 2-D animation, each 3 to 4-minute segment is themed around a single topic and by the end of each segment, viewers will actually learn how to do the task at hand. Win Lose or Fail features the most entertaining "How To" videos from the darkest reaches of the World Wide Web as each segment tells the ridiculously useful and hilariously funny story of trial and error but before that happens, we encounter crazy characters, epic failures, mind-blowing ingenuity and the untold history of each topic's road to today.
imdb.title: Win Lose or Fail
